channel.title: [317]delta based, trying to add item to there proper slot, but its not working?
channel.description: ok listen, i added a custom item into client called "black mask" i put its id in item.java under helmets. and when i compile and rerun, its still in weapon slot? is there another place i have to add it? it does tat to all my custom items.

item.title: [317]delta based, trying to add item to there proper slot, but its not working?
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

For my dragon platebody there was two areas i needed to look here…

[code]public static int body
and
public static int platebody

you need to add it in
public static int Helm
public static int fullHelm
and
public static int fullMask

if that still doesn’t work also add it in
public static int hats

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: [317]delta based, trying to add item to there proper slot, but its not working?
